document_data.name: Onlagar Blurnwood
document_data.mainbody: '''Onlagar Blurnwood''' was a mage until the late mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Onlagar Blurnwood was old and crippled.
document_data.Personality: As a master, though testy, he cared a lot for his apprentice; he was quite protective a father. He delighted in teaching Talatha about anything.
document_data.Abilities: With his apprentice's help, he defeated [[Indolrere Moravan]].
document_data.Possessions: Onlagar had a somewhat ramshackle house, which slowly fell apart after his death. Nonetheless, there were objects in it that interested people passing by, such as [[Mlanduvver Tassio]].
document_data.Relationships: Onlagar was once an adventuring companion of [[Mirt]]. The latter delivered unto him Talatha Vaerovree, whom he raised.
document_data.History: He died of a wasting disease sometime prior to {{yearlink|1370}}.
